question: Which committee has been recently assigned the task of drafting a New National Water Policy?
explanation: The government of India formed a high-powered committee led by Mihir Shah to analyze and draft new water reforms. The announcement about the team was made by the Union Ministry of Water Resources. Mihir Shah is an Indian economist and former member of the Planning Commission of India. Mihir Shah thinks that the crisis on the ground is providing a very useful wake-up call for the government.
